column1: According to PW15, he had gone to the scene of crime at 11.15 hours and
remained there till 14.30 hours. When he went to the crime scene it was fully
secured by the police officers who were assigned to secure the place.
According to PW10, the chief investigating officer, the Appellant was arrested
at  16.00  hours  upon  an  information.  Hence,  it  was  quite  clear  that  the
Appellant was arrested by the police after the upliftment of the fingerprint
from the handle of the almirah in the house of the deceased.
